name: Bargain Blocz
description:
Think Fast!


In bargain blocz you have to fill up the boards without losing much time.

Can you do it?

You have to think quick and avoid getting stuck in corners while visualizing the path you want to take as you progress.

The more time you save, the more points you get at the end of the cups.

Cups are sets of levels organized from easier to harder as you go through the levels you'll find new challenges that will require strategy adaptation, like tiles that only let you go in one direction or tiles that let you go diagonally.

Features


  • Over 100 levels at launch
  • Tiles with different behaviours
  • Cute pixel art
